title: Brooklyn Luncheonette Scene, 1970
description: A black and white photograph captures an older man in a hat and coat sitting at the counter of a luncheonette. Two other men sit nearby, one drinking from a carton labeled 'MARS FOAM 16 OZ.' Behind them are shelves with more boxes. The photograph is accompanied by a typed note describing the scene as life in Brooklyn, New York, emphasizing the simple ambiance of the eatery compared to more upscale city locations. The note is dated January 14, 1970.
